meanings.definition: A sail extended by a sprit.
meanings.sent1: The spritsail fluttered gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The sailors hoisted the spritsail to catch the wind.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous seagull landed on the spritsail and took a short nap.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like a colorful spritsail dancing in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The spritsail billowed out like a giant, white cloud against the blue sky.

meanings.definition: A fore-and-aft sail set on a sprit.
meanings.sent1: The spritsail helped the boat move smoothly through the water.
meanings.sent2: The captain adjusted the spritsail to change the direction of the vessel.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous seagull landed on the spritsail and tried to steer the boat.
meanings.sent4: Her voice carried through the room like a taut spritsail catching the wind.
meanings.sent5: The spritsail unfurled gracefully, propelling the boat forward with ease.
